languages.text: "Они только мешают! Я изыскиваю способ устранить ошибку". {n}Паскаль бормочет, не отрывая взгляд от инфопластины. В лихорадочных движениях мехадендритов сквозит тревога.{/n}

"They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Они только мешают! Я изыскиваю способ устранить ошибку". {n}Паскаль бормочет, не отрывая взгляд от инфопластины. В лихорадочных движениях мехадендритов сквозит тревога.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "All they are doing is getting in my way! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

"All they are doing is getting in my way! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

"They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

"They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

"They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

languages.text: "Sie wären nur ein Hindernis. Ich suche nach einem Weg, den Fehler zu berichtigen." {n}Pasqal murmelt etwas, ohne den Blick von seinem Datablock abzuwenden. Die Art und Weise wie er seine Mechadendriten bewegt, lässt eine gewisse Bangigkeit vermuten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie wären nur ein Hindernis. Ich suche nach einem Weg, den Fehler zu berichtigen." {n}Pasqal murmelt etwas, ohne den Blick von seinem Datablock abzuwenden. Die Art und Weise wie er seine Mechadendriten bewegt, lässt eine gewisse Bangigkeit vermuten.{/n}

languages.text: « Ils ne feraient que me gêner ! Je cherche un moyen de rectifier l'erreur. » {n}Pasqal marmonne sans lever les yeux de sa plaque de données. Sa façon de bouger ses mécadendrites trahit une certaine anxiété.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ils ne feraient que me gêner ! Je cherche un moyen de rectifier l'erreur. » {n}Pasqal marmonne sans lever les yeux de sa plaque de données. Sa façon de bouger ses mécadendrites trahit une certaine anxiété.{/n}

languages.text: “他们只会碍事！我正在想办法修正这个错误。”{n}帕斯卡喃喃低语道，目光死死地数据板。他身上的机械触须躁动不安，暴露了他心中的焦虑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们只会碍事！我正在想办法修正这个错误。”{n}帕斯卡喃喃低语道，目光死死地数据板。他身上的机械触须躁动不安，暴露了他心中的焦虑。{/n}

languages.text: 「本当に邪魔なやつらだ！今エラーを修正する方法を探しているのに」{n}パスカルはデータスレートから目を離さずにぶつぶつと言う。彼の機械触手の動きには何か不安を感じさせるものがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「本当に邪魔なやつらだ！今エラーを修正する方法を探している」{n}パスカルはデータスレートから目を話さずにぶつぶつと言う。彼の機械触手の動きには何か不安を感じさせるものがあった。{/n}
「本当に邪魔なやつらだ！今エラーを修正する方法を探しているのに」{n}パスカルはデータスレートから目を離さずにぶつぶつと言う。彼の機械触手の動きには何か不安を感じさせるものがあった。{/n}

languages.text: «¡No harán más que estorbar! Estoy intentando rectificar mi error». {n}Pasqal murmura sin apartar los ojos de la tablilla de datos y mueve sus mecadendritas con cierto nerviosismo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡No harán más que estorbar! Estoy intentando rectificar mi error». {n}Pasqal murmura sin apartar los ojos de la tablilla de datos y mueve sus mecadendritas con cierto nerviosismo.{/n}

languages.text: "Şu an sadece köstek olurlar! Hatayı düzeltmek için bir yol arayışındayım." {n}Pasqal, gözlerini databeladan ayırmadan mırıldanıyor. Mekadentritlerini hareket ettirme şeklinde belli bir kaygı sezilebiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They would only be a hindrance! I am searching for a way to rectify the error." {n}Pasqal is muttering without taking his eyes off the data-slate. There is a certain anxiousness to the way he moves his mechadendrites.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca köstek olabilirler! Hatayı düzeltmek için bir yol arayışındayım." {n}Pasqal gözlerini databeladan ayırmadan söyleniyor. Mekadentritlerini hareket ettirme şeklinde belli bir kaygı sezilebiliyor.{/n}
